channel.title: Compiler (already used search)
channel.description:
Well im using the pkerslyfe source and its compiler, At first I couldn't run it due to me having a different javac version
so i changed C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[b]12[/b]\bin\javac.exe
to C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[b]13[/b]\bin\javac.exe
but now when i run it says type c to compile, but when i do this it just says press any key to continue and does nothing, also does the same when i press any other key.
source is
[code] @echo off color 77 title Ags Pking Compile echo ======================== echo Type C For Compile echo ======================== echo Type any other to close :def set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile :compile "C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause goto def :run JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI pause [/code]

item.title: Compiler (already used search)
item.dc:creator: @public_boolean public boolean
item.description:
@public_boolean wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

BBCode

BBCode or Bulletin Board Code is a lightweight markup language used to format posts in many message boards and on sites based on MediaWiki. The available tags are usually indicated by square brackets ([ ]) surrounding a keyword, and they are parsed by the message board system before being translated into a markup language that web browsers understand—usually HTML or XHTML. BBCode was introduced in 1998 by the messageboard software Ultimate Bulletin Board (UBB) implemented in Perl. In 2000 BBCode...

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler (already used search)
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Well im using the pkerslyfe source and its compiler, At first I couldn’t run it due to me having a different javac version

so i changed C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe

to C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe

but now when i run it says type c to compile, but when i do this it just says press any key to continue and does nothing, also does the same when i press any other key.

source is

@echo off
color 77
title Ags Pking Compile
echo ========================
echo Type C For Compile
echo ========================
echo Type any other to close
:def
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
:compile
"C:\program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause
goto def
:run
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
pause

Read full topic
